title: Superlinear Returns
summary_en: Understanding the concept of superlinear returns is crucial for navigating success and exponential growth in various fields such as business, fame, and power. Exponential growth and thresholds are fundamental causes of superlinear returns. The phenomenon of winner-take-all emphasizes the impact of thresholds on outcomes.
summary_zh: 理解超线性回报的概念对于在各领域如商业、名望和权力中取得成功和指数增长至关重要。指数增长和门槛是超线性回报的基本原因。赢者通吃的现象强调了门槛对结果的影响。
best_quote_en: You can't understand the world without understanding the concept of superlinear returns. And if you're ambitious you definitely should, because this will be the wave you surf on.
best_quote_zh: 如果你有雄心壮志，就一定要理解超线性回报的概念，因为这将是你乘风破浪的浪潮。

title: How to Do Great Work
summary_en: To do great work, choose tasks aligned with your natural aptitude and deep interest, learn at the frontier of knowledge, notice gaps, and explore outlier ideas. Working on your own projects, driven by curiosity and passion, can lead to impactful discoveries.
summary_zh: 要做出杰出的工作，选择与自己天赋和浓厚兴趣相关的任务，学习知识的前沿，发现知识中的空白，探索非主流的想法。专注于个人项目，以好奇心和激情驱动，可能会带来有影响力的发现。
best_quote_en: Interest will drive you to work harder than mere diligence ever could.
best_quote_zh: 兴趣将比单纯的勤奋推动你更努力地工作。

title: How to Get New Ideas
summary_en: To get new ideas, notice anomalies at the frontiers of knowledge where gaps exist, leading to new discoveries.
summary_zh: 要获得新创意，注意知识边界上存在的异常，这些空白处能带来新的发现。
best_quote_en: The way to get new ideas is to notice anomalies: what seems strange, or missing, or broken?
best_quote_zh: 获得新创意的方法是注意异常：看起来奇怪、缺失或有问题的地方？

title: The Need to Read
summary_en: Reading is essential not only for acquiring knowledge about specific topics but also for developing critical thinking and writing skills.
summary_zh: 阅读不仅能帮助获取特定主题知识，还能培养批判性思维和写作能力。
best_quote_en: You can't think well without writing well, and you can't write well without reading well.
best_quote_zh: 你无法写作得好而思维不清晰，也无法阅读得好而写作不出色。

title: What You (Want to)* Want
summary_en: The article discusses the paradox between free will and determinism, highlighting the complexity of wanting and choosing in human behavior.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了自由意志与决定论之间的悖论，突出了人类行为中欲望和选择的复杂性。
best_quote_en: You can do what you want, but you can't want what you want.
best_quote_zh: 你可以做你想做的事，但你不能想要你想要的事。

title: Alien Truth
summary_en: Thinking about potential common truths between intelligent beings across the universe, including principles of controlled experiments and practice, can guide philosophical exploration towards universal insights.
summary_zh: 思考宇宙中智慧生命体之间可能的共同真相，包括实验原则和练习的原理，可以引导哲学探索朝向普世洞见。
best_quote_en: If an idea might plausibly be relevant to aliens, that's enough.
best_quote_zh: 如果一个观念可能与外星人相关，那已经足够。

title: What I've Learned from Users
summary_en: Understanding and learning from users is key to startup success. Y Combinator's experience reveals recurring startup challenges and the importance of individualized advice. Founders often overlook critical issues and struggle with counterintuitive startup dynamics. YC's success stems from addressing these challenges and providing focused guidance.
summary_zh: 了解和从用户中学习是创业成功的关键。Y Combinator的经验揭示了不断出现的创业挑战以及个性化建议的重要性。创始人经常忽视关键问题，难以应对创业的违反直觉的动态。YC的成功源于应对这些挑战并提供专注的指导。
best_quote_en: They come back a year later, and say 'We wish we'd listened to you.'
best_quote_zh: 他们一年后回来，说'我们希望当初听了你们的建议。'

title: Heresy
summary_en: The resurgence of heresy in contemporary society is compared to medieval times, as opinions now can lead to job loss. The concept of heresy prioritizes conformity over truth and can outweigh all other actions. Expressing heretical opinions is often punished more severely than committing crimes, akin to a religious intolerance resurgence in a secular form.
summary_zh: 异端观念在当代社会的复兴被比作中世纪，因为现在的观点可能导致失去工作。异端概念将一致性置于真相之上，甚至可能权衡所有其他行为。发表异端观点往往受到比犯罪更严厉的惩罚，类似于宗教不宽容精神以世俗形式复兴。
best_quote_en: The other distinctive thing about heresies, compared to ordinary opinions, is that the public expression of them outweighs everything else the speaker has done.
best_quote_zh: 异端观念的另一个与普通观点相比独特的地方在于，公开表达它们会使说话者已经做过的所有事情相形见绌。

title: Putting Ideas into Words
summary_en: Putting ideas into words is a challenging and transformative process, revealing the imperfections and incompleteness of one's initial thoughts. Writing forces authors to refine and evaluate their ideas, ultimately leading to a deeper understanding and communication of complex concepts.
summary_zh: 将思想转化为文字是一个具有挑战性和转变性的过程，揭示了最初想法的不完美和不完整性。写作迫使作者完善和评估他们的想法，最终实现深入理解和传达复杂概念。
best_quote_en: If writing down your ideas always makes them more precise and more complete, then no one who hasn't written about a topic has fully formed ideas about it.
best_quote_zh: 如果将您的想法写下总是使它们更加精确和完整，那么对一个话题没有书面记录的人在这个话题上就没有完全成熟的想法。

title: Is There Such a Thing as Good Taste?
summary_en: The essay discusses the concept of good taste by demonstrating that taste exists in art and influences all forms of artistry, challenging the belief that good taste is subjective.
summary_zh: 这篇文章讨论了好品味的概念，通过展示艺术中存在品味并影响所有形式的艺术创作，挑战了好品味是主观的观念。
best_quote_en: If there's no such thing as good taste, then there's no such thing as good art.
best_quote_zh: 如果没有好品味，那么就没有好艺术。

title: Beyond Smart
summary_en: The article argues that being smart is not the only, or even the most important, factor in having new ideas. Other key ingredients include an obsessive interest in a topic, independent-mindedness, writing ability, and cultivating beneficial working habits. These qualities can be cultivated, offering more control over generating innovative ideas.
summary_zh: 文章认为，聪明并不是产生新想法的唯一或最重要的因素。其他关键因素包括对某个主题的痴迷兴趣、独立思考能力、写作能力以及培养有益的工作习惯。这些品质可以培养，从而在产生创新想法方面提供更多控制。
best_quote_en: Being very smart was a necessary precondition for having those ideas, but the two are not identical.
best_quote_zh: 非常聪明是产生那些想法的必要前提，但两者并不相同。

title: Why did I move to New Zealand?
desc:
I get this question a lot, so here’s my honest answer.

I was living in Singapore, feeling culturally adventurous, wanting to live everywhere, meet everyone, and get to know the whole world. But then I had a baby.

At first I thought we’d raise him in Singapore, fluent in all the cultures of Asia. But after a few months, I realized how important it was to me that he have a real connection with nature. Feet in the river, hands in the mud, climbing trees, running in fields, at home in the forest. Great foundation for the soul. Maybe even a competitive advantage in a world where everyone else is dependent on devices.

Also, Singapore was a super-social place for me, where I knew too many people, and I wanted to give my boy my full attention without distraction — to live where I didn’t know anyone. So the plan was to raise him in nature for the first six years, then move somewhere more culturally expansive for the next six.

New Zealand is a nature paradise, but I also loved the safety of its location in times of global trouble. They make you a citizen if you live here for six years. So, perfect match for our situation. Raise a baby in nature, then leave with an amazing passport, and the right to return forever.

It took nine months of paperwork to become a legal resident, but the government is friendly and helpful. It’s really sweet to live in a country where the government agencies are really small, sensible, and personable. I like the culture here better than I expected.

His upbringing went as planned. Full nature boy. Not into screens or phones at all. He’s always outside, spends his days in forests and the rocky coast, and loves building physical things like tools and shelters for his adventures.

After getting New Zealand citizenship, we moved to Europe, but then Covid hit. So in a way it was just as predicted: New Zealand was a great location in times of global trouble - one of the only Covid-free places on earth - and only citizens were allowed in, so our passports felt like the golden ticket, and we moved back. While his cousins across the world were locked down in isolation, staring at screens, he was playing with friends.

His mom loves her job in the government here, so no more moving. He’s in high school now, and he’s still not into screens. He’s mentally healthy and wise, I think partially due to being raised outside in nature.

I’ve made a lot of mistakes in my life, but moving to New Zealand was a good choice.
summary_en: The author moved to New Zealand to raise her son in nature, away from distractions and screens, believing it's a great foundation for the soul. New Zealand offered safety in times of global trouble and a pathway to citizenship. After living in Europe, they returned to New Zealand during Covid, appreciating the safe environment. Raising her son in nature contributed to his mental health.
summary_zh: 作者搬到新西兰是为了在自然环境中抚养儿子，远离干扰和屏幕，她认为这能为孩子的灵魂打下良好的基础。新西兰在全球动荡时期提供了安全保障，也提供了公民身份。在欧洲生活后，他们在疫情期间返回新西兰，看重这里的安全环境。在自然环境中抚养儿子有助于他的心理健康。
best_quote_en: Feet in the river, hands in the mud, climbing trees, running in fields, at home in the forest. Great foundation for the soul.
best_quote_zh: 赤脚踩在河里，双手沾满泥土，爬树，在田野里奔跑，以森林为家。这是灵魂的绝佳基础。

title: The 2024 Trump-Biden Debate
desc:
Jeez

The post The 2024 Trump-Biden Debate appeared first on Wait But Why.
summary_en: The debate between Biden and Trump covered economy, taxes, Roe v. Wade, and border security. They clashed on their records, with Trump touting economic success and border control, while Biden criticized Trump's handling of the economy and immigration policies. Both candidates made strong, often exaggerated claims.
summary_zh: 拜登和特朗普的辩论涵盖了经济、税收、罗诉韦德案和边境安全。他们就彼此的执政记录展开了激烈的交锋，特朗普吹捧了他的经济成就和边境控制，而拜登则批评了特朗普对经济和移民政策的处理。两位候选人都发表了强烈的、有时是夸张的主张。
best_quote_en: We had the greatest economy in the history of this world or any other world.
best_quote_zh: 我们拥有这个世界或任何其他世界历史上最伟大的经济。

title: Dr. Sue Johnson: The Science of Lasting Love
desc:
This conversation will change how you handle your relationship starting tonight. The late Dr. Sue Johnson basically gave me a cheat code for relationships that not only last but amplify. She breaks down the real signals to look for in a partner.  Why people actually cheat (not what you think) and how to spot it coming …

The post Dr. Sue Johnson: The Science of Lasting Love  appeared first on Farnam Street.
summary_en: Dr. Sue Johnson's insights offer a new perspective on relationships, providing tools to identify crucial signals in a partner, understand the real reasons behind infidelity, and transform conflicts into opportunities for deeper connection. It covers keeping the spark alive, surviving the empty-nest phase, and strengthening relationships.
summary_zh: 苏·约翰逊博士的见解为处理人际关系提供了新的视角，提供了识别伴侣关键信号的工具，理解不忠的真正原因，并将冲突转化为更深层次联系的机会。内容涵盖保持激情、度过空巢期以及加强人际关系。
best_quote_en: This conversation will change how you handle your relationship starting tonight.
best_quote_zh: 今晚开始，这场对话将改变你处理人际关系的方式。

title: Weird Languages
summary_en: The article suggests that most programming involves gluing library functions together, at which common languages excel. However, the interesting part lies in the remaining small percentage, best explored through "weird languages." These languages reveal programming techniques beyond simple gluing, like using Lisp macros for domain-specific language creation. Learning weird languages expands one's understanding of programming possibilities.
summary_zh: 文章指出，大多数编程是将库函数连接在一起，常见语言对此非常擅长。然而，有趣的部分在于剩余的小部分，通过“怪异语言”可以最好地探索这一点。这些语言揭示了超越简单连接的编程技术，例如使用Lisp宏来创建特定领域的语言。学习怪异语言可以扩展人们对编程可能性的理解。
best_quote_en: In the process of learning how to say things you couldn't previously say, you'll probably be learning how to think things you couldn't previously think.
best_quote_zh: 在学习如何表达你以前无法表达的事物的过程中，你可能会学习到如何思考你以前无法思考的事物。

title: How to Work Hard
summary_en: The article emphasizes the importance of hard work alongside natural talent and practice for achieving great things. It challenges the notion that brilliance alone can evade hard work, using examples like Bill Gates, Lionel Messi, and P. G. Wodehouse to illustrate the necessity of dedication and effort. It also discusses the shift from externally imposed goals to self-driven work and finding genuine passion in one's endeavors.
summary_zh: 文章强调了努力工作与天赋和实践对于取得伟大成就的重要性。它挑战了仅靠才华就能规避努力工作的观点，并以比尔·盖茨、莱昂内尔·梅西和P.G.伍德豪斯为例，说明了奉献和努力的必要性。文章还讨论了从外部目标转向自我驱动的工作，并在事业中找到真正的激情。
best_quote_en: You can do pretty well with just two, but to do the best work you need all three: you need great natural ability and to have practiced a lot and to be trying very hard.
best_quote_zh: 如果你只有其中两样也能做得不错，但要做到最好，你需要三者兼备：你需要出色的天赋、大量的练习以及非常努力。

title: How to listen to Ulysses
desc:
1. Book a flight to Kolkata India, and from Kolkata to Istanbul, for at least four days each, between February and April. Rent a home-stay room on College Street in Kolkata, and in the Balat neighborhood of Istanbul.
  2. Get wired over-the-ear headphones, a phone with a headphone jack and long battery life, and walking shoes.
  3. Download The Odyssey audiobook, translated by Emily Wilson, read by Claire Danes. Length: 13 hours.
  4. Download two different audiobook recordings of Ulysses by James Joyce. Length: 30 hours each.
  5. Download a course about Ulysses. Length: 12 hours.
  6. On the way to Kolkata, listen to the Odyssey, start to finish.
  7. Learn about Kolkata’s Bengali identity, languages, its colonial past as the capital of British India, the Writers’ Building, the Victoria Memorial, Boi Para, and reputation as the literary capital of India.
  8. In Kolkata, walk around the city, listening to the Ulysses audiobook for ten hours per day, three days in a row, start to finish.
  9. Record (write or voice memo) all of your questions and observations. When done, ask everything to an expert or top-tier AI. Save the answers to re-read later.
  10. While travelling from Kolkata to Istanbul, listen to the course about Ulysses, for more understanding and layers of meaning, preparing you to listen again.
  11. Learn about Istanbul’s past rulers, mixed identities and languages, juxtaposition of the sacred and commercial, and note its proximity to Aegean Sea of the Odyssey.
  12. In Istanbul, listen to the other recording of Ulysses, ten hours a day, three days in a row, start to finish, while walking around the vastly different neighborhoods, taking a ferry across the Bosphorus, noticing the similarities between Istanbul’s call to prayer and Dublin’s church bells. This time you’ll have a deeper appreciation of the book.
  13. Record all of your questions and observations. Again, when done, ask everything to an expert or top-tier AI. Re-read the previous answers now, too.
  14. Back home, post pictures, videos, the GPS map of where you walked while listening, and especially your thoughts.

(I haven’t done this yet, but plan to. I listened to that Odyssey audiobook in two days of walking around Port Meadow, Oxford, and have been yearning to listen again.)
summary_en: The article describes a unique method of listening to James Joyce's 'Ulysses' by immersing oneself in different cultural settings like Kolkata and Istanbul. The suggested method involves dedicating significant time, exploring the cities while listening to the audiobook, taking notes, and seeking expert advice to gain a deeper appreciation of the novel.
summary_zh: 文章描述了一种独特的聆听詹姆斯·乔伊斯作品《尤利西斯》的方法：将自己沉浸在加尔各答和伊斯坦布尔等不同的文化环境中。该方法建议投入大量时间，在城市中漫步时听有声读物，做笔记，并寻求专家意见，以更深入地理解这部小说。
best_quote_en: This time you’ll have a deeper appreciation of the book.
best_quote_zh: 这一次你将对这本书有更深的理解。

title: All My Thoughts After 40 Hours in the Vision Pro
desc:
Welcome to the 2030s.

The post All My Thoughts After 40 Hours in the Vision Pro appeared first on Wait But Why.
summary_en: The author recounts their journey with VR, from early experiences to the Oculus Quest 2. While impressed, they and others haven't been 'hooked' long-term.  The piece questions VR's mass adoption potential and introduces Apple's entry into the market, recalling significant tech moments.
summary_zh: 作者回顾了自己与VR的渊源，从早期的体验到Oculus Quest 2。虽然印象深刻，但他们和其他人都未能长期“沉迷”。文章质疑了VR的大规模普及潜力，并介绍了苹果公司进军该市场，回忆起重要的科技时刻。
best_quote_en: VR blows everyone away when they try it, but it seems to have a hard time hooking people for the long run.
best_quote_zh: VR会让每一个体验它的人感到震撼，但它似乎很难让人们长期沉迷其中。

title: [Outliers] Sol Price: The Godfather of Costco, Walmart, and Modern Retail
desc:
Sol Price is the most influential retailer you’ve never heard of. A man who never sought the spotlight, but whose legacy and lessons cover the entire landscape of modern retail. Have you ever wondered why you can still buy a hot dog and soda for $1.50 today at Costco? We can thank Sol Price for that. To him, …

The post [Outliers] Sol Price: The Godfather of Costco, Walmart, and Modern Retail appeared first on Farnam Street.
summary_en: Sol Price, the unsung hero of retail, influenced Costco, Walmart, and modern retail. He pioneered warehouse clubs and membership retail, emphasizing customer promises over profits. Lessons include embracing ignorance, intelligently choosing sales to lose, and prioritizing customer trust. He believed in empowering employees and serving a niche completely. His principles shaped retail giants like Home Depot and Sam's Club.
summary_zh: Sol Price是一位不为人知的零售英雄，影响了Costco、沃尔玛和现代零售业。他开创了仓储式俱乐部和会员制零售，强调对顾客的承诺高于利润。其经验包括拥抱无知、明智地选择放弃部分销售，以及优先考虑顾客信任。他坚信赋能员工，并彻底服务于某个细分市场。他的原则塑造了家得宝和山姆会员店等零售巨头。
best_quote_en: When you treat customers like clients, not targets, trust becomes your greatest asset.
best_quote_zh: 当你像对待客户一样对待顾客，而不是把他们当作目标时，信任就会成为你最大的资产。

title: A Project of One's Own
summary_en: The author discusses the importance of working on personal projects, contrasting it with ordinary work and school assignments. Personal projects foster excitement, engagement, and a sense of purpose. The author advocates for prioritizing these projects, recognizing their predictive value for future success and fulfillment, even above academic achievements.
summary_zh: 作者探讨了从事个人项目的重要性，将其与普通工作和学校作业进行对比。个人项目可以培养兴奋感、投入感和目标感。作者提倡优先考虑这些项目，认识到它们对未来成功和成就的预测价值，甚至高于学业成就。
best_quote_en: Working on a project of your own is as different from ordinary work as skating is from walking. It's more fun, but also much more productive.
best_quote_zh: 从事你自己的项目与普通工作截然不同，就像滑冰与走路不同一样。它更有趣，但也更有效率。

title: Citybound: City building game, microscopic models to vividly simulate organism
summary_en: Citybound is a city-building game simulating urban organisms through individual interactions. It features micro-economy and traffic simulations, where each household and vehicle is independently modeled. The game emphasizes detailed planning tools for infrastructure and zoning, supporting collaborative multiplayer. The open-source project aims for realistic city simulation with community funding.
summary_zh: Citybound 是一款城市建造游戏，通过模拟个体互动来生动地模拟城市有机体。它具有微观经济和交通模拟功能，其中每个家庭和车辆都是独立建模的。该游戏强调用于基础设施和区域规划的详细规划工具，支持协作多人游戏。这个开源项目旨在通过社区资助实现逼真的城市模拟。
best_quote_en: In Citybound, every single trip of every person is simulated microscopically.
best_quote_zh: 在 Citybound 中，每个人的每一次出行都在微观层面进行模拟。

title: Create custom Apple-like gradients using shaders
summary_en: This article is about creating custom Apple-like gradients using shaders. It allows users to adjust animation speed, flow, noise intensity, and blending options like Smooth Mix, Additive, Screen, and Overlay. It also includes options to add blobs and example gradients such as Aurora, Nebula, Sunset, and Ocean.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了如何使用着色器创建自定义的类似Apple的渐变效果。它允许用户调整动画速度、流动、噪声强度以及混合选项，如平滑混合、叠加、滤色和叠加。此外，还包括添加斑点的选项以及Aurora、Nebula、Sunset和Ocean等示例渐变。
best_quote_en: It does not contains directly quotable sentences or clear insights, so leave it empty.
best_quote_zh: 文章不包含可以直接引用的句子或清晰的洞察力，所以留空。

title: AI Assisted Editors: A Comparison (Part 1)
summary_en: This article compares AI-assisted code editors, focusing on paid versions like GitHub Copilot, Cursor, and AWS Kiro. It discusses features, pros, and cons, particularly around model selection, enterprise capabilities, and prompting complexity. The author highlights the practical usage of these tools in a project and outlines the strengths and weaknesses of GitHub Copilot.
summary_zh: 本文比较了AI辅助代码编辑器，重点介绍了GitHub Copilot、Cursor和AWS Kiro等付费版本。讨论了它们的功能、优缺点，特别是围绕模型选择、企业功能和提示复杂性。作者强调了在项目中实际使用这些工具的情况，并概述了GitHub Copilot的优缺点。
best_quote_en: You can’t go a lap about development these days without bumping into AI assisted editors.
best_quote_zh: 如今，在开发领域，你几乎无法绕过AI辅助编辑器。

title: The fixed length bottleneck and the feed forward network
summary_en: The author reflects on a potential bottleneck in LLMs related to the fixed-length context vector processed by the feed-forward network. The author compares it to the fixed-length bottleneck in early machine translation systems and seeks understanding of how the attention mechanism and FFNs interplay to address this limitation.
summary_zh: 作者反思了LLM中可能存在的瓶颈，该瓶颈与前馈网络处理的固定长度上下文向量有关。作者将其与早期机器翻译系统中的固定长度瓶颈进行了比较，并寻求理解注意力机制和FFN如何相互作用以解决此限制。
best_quote_en: Here's the issue: in my mental model of the LLM, the attention mechanism is working out what to think about, but the FFN is what's doing the thinking (for hand-wavy values of 'thinking').
best_quote_zh: 问题在于：在我的LLM心智模型中，注意力机制负责确定思考的内容，而FFN则负责进行思考（对于'思考'这个概念的粗略理解）。

title: I wanted to take more pictures, so I vibecoded a portfolio
summary_en: The author, interested in photography, built a personal portfolio site using Hugo and ChatGPT. They aimed for a minimal, static website hosted on Github pages with images on Backblaze. best_quote_en: It felt very messy, sometimes it suggested big changes, it was difficult to keep track of all the changes, and at some point it just become a process of… just accepting the suggestions and see what happens.

Direct DB queries will take a tens of milliseconds while queries through Supavisor will take a minimum of 200ms and up to 5s.

This is phenomena independent of the underlying query even `SELECT 1` through Supavisor can take up to 5s.

title: Why Game Devs Don't Merge Files
summary_en: Game development heavily relies on binary files for multimedia assets, unlike text-based business software. Merging binary files is difficult, impacting workflows and version control. Game studios use asset locking and custom CI/CD pipelines. Programmers support artists, who are the majority in game development teams. Programmer accepts the needs of the majority of the project and take the back seat, rather than having everything revolve around programming workflows.
summary_zh: 游戏开发与商业软件不同，它严重依赖二进制文件进行多媒体资源的处理。合并二进制文件非常困难，这影响了工作流程和版本控制。游戏工作室使用资源锁定和定制的CI/CD流程。程序员主要为美术师提供支持，而美术师是游戏开发团队中的多数。程序员接受项目多数的需求，并退居幕后，而不是让一切都围绕编程工作流程展开。
best_quote_en: Unlike Text World, this is one of those cases where it makes sense for programmers to accept the needs of the majority of the project and take the back seat, rather than having everything revolve around programming workflows.
best_quote_zh: 与文本世界不同，在游戏开发中，程序员接受项目多数的需求，并退居幕后，而不是让一切都围绕编程工作流程展开，这是一种更合理的做法。

title: Three AI Futures
summary_en: The article discusses three potential AI futures: The Merger (human-machine integration), The Utopia (AI-driven abundance), and Agentic AI. It critiques Kurzweil's singularity concept and Sohn's AI-run government, suggesting Agentic automation is a more plausible and disturbing threat. It also raises concerns about the feasibility of achieving AGI and the potential for machine subjugation.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了三种潜在的人工智能未来：融合（人机融合）、乌托邦（人工智能驱动的富足）和 Agentic AI。它批判了库兹韦尔的奇点概念和 Sohn 的人工智能政府，认为 Agentic 自动化是一个更合理和令人不安的威胁。文章还提出了对实现通用人工智能（AGI）可行性的担忧，及机器统治人类的可能性。
best_quote_en: While the Merger and the Utopia are unlikely, an Agentic automation singularity is a disturbing threat.
best_quote_zh: 虽然人机融合和乌托邦不太可能实现，但 Agentic 自动化奇点是一个令人不安的威胁。

title: Upcoming DeepSeek AI model failed to train using Huawei's chips
summary_en: DeepSeek delayed its new model release after failing to train it using Huawei's chips, showcasing the limitations of China's tech self-sufficiency efforts. Technical issues with Huawei's Ascend processors led DeepSeek to revert to Nvidia for training, highlighting the gap between Chinese and US chips.
summary_zh: DeepSeek在使用华为芯片训练新模型失败后，推迟了发布。这突显了中国在技术自给自足方面面临的挑战。由于华为昇腾处理器存在技术问题，DeepSeek转而使用英伟达芯片进行训练，这突显了中国芯片与美国芯片之间的差距。
best_quote_en: DeepSeek’s difficulties show how Chinese chips still lag behind their US rivals for critical tasks, highlighting the challenges facing China’s drive to be technologically self-sufficient.
best_quote_zh: DeepSeek遇到的困难表明，中国芯片在关键任务方面仍然落后于美国竞争对手，突显了中国在实现技术自给自足方面面临的挑战。

title: Our Workflow with Blender and Godot
summary_en: The Blender Studio team developed a pipeline between Blender and Godot for the DOGWALK project, aiming to leverage Blender for asset creation, scene assembly, and animation. They chose glTF as the exchange format due to its native support and extensibility. Custom code and Blender's export collection feature were used to automate the export process and ensure proper asset separation, enabling efficient collaboration and iteration.
summary_zh: Blender Studio团队为DOGWALK项目开发了Blender和Godot之间的工作流程，旨在利用Blender进行资源创建、场景组装和动画制作。他们选择glTF作为交换格式，因为它具有原生支持和可扩展性。自定义代码和Blender的导出集合功能用于自动化导出过程并确保适当的资源分离，从而实现高效的协作和迭代。
best_quote_en: This kind of DCC centric workflow is not necessarily common in game development. But for us it was the right approach and enabled us play to our strengths.
best_quote_zh: 这种以DCC为中心的工作流程在游戏开发中并不常见。但对我们来说，这是正确的方法，使我们能够发挥我们的优势。

title: Language Models as Thespians
summary_en: This article draws an analogy between Large Language Models (LLMs) and actors, suggesting that LLMs prioritize mimicking language patterns rather than expressing truth, much like actors focus on believable portrayals. The author demonstrates how assigning a persona to LLMs, similar to actors researching roles, can significantly improve output quality. Thinking of LLMs as actors offers predictive power and benefits users by implying the technique of prompting LLMs to adopt a persona. Questioning the audience of LLMs is also important.
summary_zh: 本文将大型语言模型（LLM）比作演员，认为LLM像演员专注于可信的角色塑造一样，优先模仿语言模式，而非表达真理。作者展示了如何通过赋予LLM角色定位，类似演员研究角色，来显著提高输出质量。将LLM视为演员具有预测能力，并通过暗示使用角色提示技术来使用户受益。质疑LLM的受众也至关重要。
best_quote_en: LLMs are computer programs built to mimic human language; like actors, they are more concerned with matching expected patterns of natural language than they are with expressing consistent or true statements.
best_quote_zh: 大型语言模型是旨在模仿人类语言的计算机程序；与演员一样，它们更关心的是匹配预期的自然语言模式，而不是表达一致或真实的陈述。

title: Embedding Text Documents with Qwen3

It outlines the process of reading documents from S3, chunking them into sentences using spaCy, computing embeddings, and writing results. It also compares text embedding models.
summary_zh: 本文详细介绍了一种使用 Qwen3-Embedding-0.6B 嵌入数百万文本文件的方法，实现了近 100% 的 GPU 利用率。文章概述了从 S3 读取文档，使用 spaCy 将其分块为句子，计算嵌入并写入结果的过程。同时，它还比较了不同的文本嵌入模型。
best_quote_en: That’s usually the gold standard that machine learning engineers aim for… but here’s the twist: in the time it took to write this blog post, we found a way to make the same workload 3× faster, and it didn’t involve maxing out GPU utilization at all.
best_quote_zh: 这通常是机器学习工程师追求的黄金标准……但有趣的是：在撰写这篇博文的时间里，我们找到了一种使相同工作负载速度提高 3 倍的方法，而且根本不需要最大限度地提高 GPU 利用率。

title: If Indian goods cannot go to the US, they can head to Russia

The upcoming Putin-Modi meeting in New Delhi is expected to further strengthen bilateral cooperation, especially in trade and defense, as India continues Russian oil procurement based on economic considerations despite US pressure and tariffs.

title: From Sound to Meaning: A Deep Meaning Comprehension by DeepSeek
summary_en: The article explores the connection between sound and meaning in language, challenging the traditional linguistic view that they are arbitrary. It references research on Austro-Tai languages and the 'Bouba-Kiki effect,' and studies showing non-arbitrary patterns in languages globally, suggesting a fundamental link between sound and meaning.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了语言中声音和意义之间的联系，挑战了传统的语言学观点，即它们是任意的。它引用了关于南岛语系的研究和“Bouba-Kiki效应”，以及全球语言中显示的非任意模式的研究，表明声音和意义之间存在着根本的联系。
best_quote_en: When sound has its own meaning before becoming someone’s speech, When sound has its own life before being articulated as someone’s language, When sound is aware of itself before becoming someone’s thought.
best_quote_zh: 当声音在成为某人的言语之前就有了自己的意义，当声音在被表达成某人的语言之前就有了自己的生命，当声音在成为某人的思想之前就意识到了自己。

title: Postgres in 2025: No managed service required?

title: Show HN: Code – coding CLI with browser control and diffs
desc:
Hey HN,

Today we're launching Code, a community-driven, open-source coding agent for your terminal. It's a fork of OpenAI's codex with a focus on developer ergonomics and local control.

Key features: - Browser integration – attach to your Chrome via CDP or use a built-in headless browser. You can browse pages, run the CLI in a browser session, and even take screenshots from the terminal. - Multi-agent commands – /plan, /solve and /code orchestrate multiple models (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) to propose and implement solutions, with consensus or race options. - Diff viewer – see proposed changes in a unified side-by-side diff with syntax highlighting before you apply them. - Theme system & reasoning control – customise the TUI with /themes and adjust model reasoning effort on the fly with /reasoning. - Safety modes & sandboxing – run read-only or require approvals to keep your projects safe.

To try it right away: ``` bash npx -y @just-every/code # or install globally npm install -g @just-every/code code # or `coder` if you already have a `code` command ```

You can authenticate with ChatGPT (Plus/Pro/Team) or an API key, and even hook in other CLI agents like @anthropic-ai/claude-code and @google/gemini-cli.

We're launching on Product Hunt today if you'd like to support us: https://www.producthunt.com/products/code

Would love to hear your feedback, suggestions, and bug reports. Happy to answer questions here!

It supports various features such as diff viewing, safety modes, and integration with Claude & Gemini. It is designed for developers to automate tasks, generate reports, and perform batch processing. Configuration and security are prioritized, with options for API key authentication and local data storage.
summary_zh: Code是一个社区驱动的CLI编码工具，集成了浏览器、多代理命令、主题和推理控制，并与原始Codex兼容。它支持差异查看、安全模式以及与Claude & Gemini的集成等多种功能。它专为开发人员设计，用于自动化任务、生成报告和执行批量处理。配置和安全性是优先考虑的事项，可以选择API密钥身份验证和本地数据存储。
best_quote_en: Code can remember context across sessions: Create an AGENTS.md or CLAUDE.md file in your project root.
best_quote_zh: Code可以记住会话间的上下文：在项目根目录中创建一个AGENTS.md或CLAUDE.md文件。

title: Australia Post halts transit shipping to US as 'chaotic' tariff deadline looms
summary_en: Australia Post has suspended transit shipping to the US due to upcoming tariffs on low-value parcels, causing chaos for postal networks and retailers. The new tariffs, effective August 29, end the 'de minimis' exemption, impacting e-commerce and creating uncertainty around duty collection. Other global postal carriers are also halting US shipments.
summary_zh: 由于即将对低价值包裹征收关税, 澳大利亚邮政已暂停向美国转运货物，这给邮政网络和零售商带来了混乱。新关税将于8月29日生效，结束了“最低限度”的豁免，影响了电子商务，也给关税征收带来了不确定性。其他全球邮政运营商也纷纷停止向美国发货。
best_quote_en: "A lot of uncertainty, a lot of concern about the postal stream being heavily impacted, and just a little over a week to get ready."
best_quote_zh: “存在很多不确定性，人们非常担心邮政业务会受到严重影响，而且只有一周多的时间来做准备。”

title: Smartphone makers must do more to protect children
summary_en: The UK's safeguarding minister urges smartphone makers to enhance child protection measures. The article highlights the need for better safeguards for children using smartphones.
summary_zh: 英国保障大臣呼吁智能手机制造商加强儿童保护措施。文章强调需要改善儿童使用智能手机的安全保障。
best_quote_en: Smartphone makers must do more to protect children.
best_quote_zh: 智能手机制造商必须采取更多措施来保护儿童。

title: Martyrs to the Unspeakable: The Assassinations of JFK, Martin, Malcolm, and RFK
summary_en: The book "Martyrs to the Unspeakable" explores the assassinations of JFK, Martin Luther King Jr., Malcolm X, and RFK, arguing they were targeted for their prophetic commitments to peace and social transformation. It suggests these leaders were viewed as enemies of the state by elements within the military-industrial-intelligence complex. The book aims to uncover this hidden history to advance their mission of peace.
summary_zh: 《不可言说的殉道者》探讨了肯尼迪、马丁·路德·金、马尔科姆·X和罗伯特·肯尼迪被刺杀事件，认为他们因对和平与社会变革的预言性承诺而成为目标。书中指出，这些领袖被军工情报综合体内的某些势力视为国家公敌。本书旨在揭示这段隐藏的历史，以推进他们追求和平的使命。
best_quote_en: In each case, American figures who made a prophetic commitment to peace and social transformation were regarded as enemies of the state who had to be eliminated.
best_quote_zh: 在每个案例中，那些对和平与社会变革做出预言性承诺的美国人物都被视为国家的敌人，必须被清除。

title: OUI-Spy Is a Slick Bluetooth Low Energy Scanner
summary_en: The OUI-SPY is a Bluetooth Low Energy scanner designed by Colonel Panic, powered by a Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32S3. It features two modes: a multi-target BLE device scanner with OUI filtering and a precision proximity tracker for radio direction finding (foxhunting). It includes a buzzer for alerts and a web-based interface for configuration.
summary_zh: OUI-SPY是由Colonel Panic设计的低功耗蓝牙扫描器，由Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32S3驱动。 它具有两种模式：具有OUI过滤的多目标BLE设备扫描器和用于无线电测向（无线电测向）的精确接近跟踪器。 它包括一个用于警报的蜂鸣器和一个用于配置的基于Web的界面。
best_quote_en: "snoop unto them as they snoop unto us"
best_quote_zh: 以其人之道还治其人之身

title: How to load test PostgreSQL database and not miss anything
summary_en: This article introduces pg_perfbench, a tool developed to automate PostgreSQL load testing with pgbench. It addresses the issue of non-representative results by recording DBMS configuration, server characteristics, and PostgreSQL versions. The tool streamlines result comparison by registering all parameters in a single template, collecting metadata, and generating structured reports, ensuring repeatable scenarios and preventing data loss.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了pg_perfbench，一个用于自动化PostgreSQL负载测试的工具，它使用pgbench。该工具通过记录DBMS配置、服务器特性和PostgreSQL版本来解决结果不具代表性的问题。通过在单个模板中注册所有参数、收集元数据和生成结构化报告，简化了结果比较，确保可重复的场景并防止数据丢失。
best_quote_en: Any insignificant change, whether the use of different data directories (for example, one with included checksums, and another without them) or other differences in hardware and network configuration, can significantly affect the results.
best_quote_zh: 任何微小的变化，无论是使用不同的数据目录（例如，一个包含校验和，另一个不包含），还是硬件和网络配置的其他差异，都可能显著影响结果。

title: Sonic Liberation Devices
summary_en: This work emphasizes the power of community, music, process, perseverance, intentional design, shared knowledge, resources, truth-telling, and liberation technology. It advocates for the freedom of Palestine, Haiti, Congo, Sudan, Armenia, Tigray, Cuba, Puerto Rico, the Caribbean, Africa, and all indigenous and oppressed people.
summary_zh: 这项工作强调了社区、音乐、过程、毅力、有意设计、共享知识、资源、讲真话和解放技术的力量。它倡导巴勒斯坦、海地、刚果、苏丹、亚美尼亚、提格雷、古巴、波多黎各、加勒比、非洲以及所有土著和受压迫人民的自由。
best_quote_en: The power of community, the power of music, the power of process, the power of perseverance, the power of intentional design, the power of shared knowledge, the power of shared resources, the power of truth telling, the power of Liberation Technology.
best_quote_zh: 社区的力量，音乐的力量，过程的力量，毅力的力量，有意设计（intentional design）的力量，共享知识的力量，共享资源的力量，讲真话的力量，解放技术的力量。

title: Claude Code's erratic behavior from May-August 2025
summary_en: From May to August 2025, Claude Code exhibited erratic behavior, including ignoring instructions, inventing details, and code malfunctions. A repository was created to consolidate complaints after issues were closed without resolution. The goal is to raise awareness and prompt the developers to address these persistent problems.
summary_zh: 2025年5月至8月期间，Claude Code表现出不稳定的行为，包括忽略指令、捏造细节和代码故障。由于问题在未解决的情况下被关闭，因此创建了一个存储库来整合用户的投诉。目标是提高人们的意识，并促使开发人员解决这些持续存在的问题。
best_quote_en: This repository exists solely as a constructive effort to highlight persistent issues that need attention for the improvement of Claude Code.
best_quote_zh: 该存储库的存在仅仅是为了建设性地突出需要关注的持续存在的问题，以改进 Claude Code。

title: AI Is Nothing Like a Brain, and That's OK
summary_en: The article discusses the differences between artificial intelligence and the human brain, despite AI initially drawing inspiration from neuroscience. It highlights the simplification in AI compared to the brain's complexity but suggests that comparing the two can still offer valuable insights for improving both AI and our understanding of the brain.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了人工智能与人脑之间的差异，尽管人工智能最初的灵感来源于神经科学。文章强调了人工智能相对于人脑的复杂性而言的简化，但认为比较两者仍然可以为改进人工智能和我们对大脑的理解提供有价值的见解。
best_quote_en: "[The brain] is the most complex piece of active matter in the known universe."
best_quote_zh: “（大脑）是已知宇宙中最复杂的活性物质。”

title: LNS-Madam: Low-Precision Training in Log Using Multiplicative Weight Update
summary_en: This paper introduces LNS-Madam, a low-precision training framework for deep neural networks (DNNs) using a logarithmic number system (LNS) and a multiplicative weight update algorithm (Madam). It aims to reduce memory and energy consumption. LNS-Madam achieves comparable accuracy to full-precision training with only 8 bits, reducing energy consumption by over 90% and 55% compared to FP32 and FP8, respectively.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一种低精度训练框架LNS-Madam，用于深度神经网络 (DNN)。LNS-Madam 使用对数数字系统 (LNS) 和乘法权重更新算法 (Madam)，旨在减少内存和能源消耗。实验结果表明，LNS-Madam 仅用 8 位即可实现与全精度训练相当的精度，与 FP32 和 FP8 相比，能耗分别降低 90% 以上和 55%。
best_quote_en: We prove that LNS-Madam results in low quantization error during weight updates, leading to stable performance even if the precision is limited.
best_quote_zh: 我们证明了 LNS-Madam 在权重更新期间产生较低的量化误差，即使在精度有限的情况下也能实现稳定的性能。

title: Const Trait Counterexamples
summary_en: This article discusses the design considerations and counterarguments surrounding Rust's const traits feature. It explores the current proposal, which involves using "const trait" and "~const" modifiers to allow trait methods in const contexts. It also examines and refutes alternative proposals, such as making "~const" the default, due to compatibility and complexity issues.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了Rust中const traits特性的设计考虑和反对意见。它探讨了当前方案，该方案涉及使用"const trait"和"~const"修饰符以允许在const上下文中使用trait方法。同时，文章也检验并反驳了其他替代方案，例如由于兼容性和复杂性问题而将"~const"设为默认值。
best_quote_en: "const fn is "always-const" (and not "maybe-const") in a sense that it simply imposes additional constraints if called in const contexts."
best_quote_zh: const fn在某种意义上是“永远const”（而不是“可能const”），它只是在const上下文中调用时施加额外的约束。

title: World Wide Lightning Location Network
summary_en: The World Wide Lightning Location Network (WWLLN) is a global network of VLF radio lightning sensors operated by the University of Washington. It monitors lightning activity worldwide, providing data and maps. The network welcomes sensor hosting offers for research collaboration and distributes data through subscriptions and commercial resellers.
summary_zh: 世界范围闪电定位网络 (WWLLN) 是由华盛顿大学运营的全球甚低频无线电闪电传感器网络。它监测全球的闪电活动，提供数据和地图。该网络欢迎提供传感器托管，以进行研究合作，并通过订阅和商业经销商分发数据。
best_quote_en: Only the whole network does that.
best_quote_zh: 只有整个网络才能做到。

title: Manim: Animation engine for explanatory math videos
summary_en: Manim is a Python library for creating mathematical animations, initially developed by 3Blue1Brown. There are two versions: the original and a community edition. Installation instructions vary depending on the version and operating system. Manim requires Python 3.7+, FFmpeg, OpenGL, and optionally LaTeX. It's used for explanatory videos and animations.
summary_zh: Manim是一个用于创建数学动画的Python库，最初由3Blue1Brown开发。它有两个版本：原始版本和社区版本。安装说明因版本和操作系统而异。Manim需要Python 3.7+、FFmpeg、OpenGL，以及可选的LaTeX。它常被用于制作解释性视频和动画。
best_quote_en: Manim is an engine for precise programmatic animations, designed for creating explanatory math videos.
best_quote_zh: Manim是一个用于精确程序动画的引擎，专为创建数学解释视频而设计。

title: Welcome to Fairbourne, the Welsh town that could one day be swallowed by the sea
summary_en: Fairbourne, a Welsh town, faces demolition due to rising sea levels, making its residents, the UK's first "climate refugees." The council decided it couldn't afford to protect the town after 2054, causing property values to plummet and residents to lose their homes and livelihoods. Residents feel isolated and unfairly singled out.
summary_zh: 威尔士小镇费尔伯恩由于海平面上升面临拆迁，居民成为英国首批“气候难民”。当地政府认为无法在2054年后继续保护该镇，导致房产价值暴跌，居民失去家园和生计。居民们感到孤立和不公平。
best_quote_en: "If we have to move, we've got to abandon this way of life and learn to live in a new way. It's more than just losing your home; it's losing your whole identity."
best_quote_zh: “如果我们不得不搬迁，我们就必须放弃这种生活方式，并学习以一种新的方式生活。这不仅仅是失去你的家；这是失去你的整个身份。”

title: Should you use a standing desk? The benefits are real, but seem to vary with age
summary_en: Standing desks aim to combat health risks of prolonged sitting. Studies show varying benefits with age. The human body evolved for movement, not sedentary cubicle life. Standing desks are a popular approach to help people become more upright, but effectiveness is still under research.
summary_zh: 站立式办公桌旨在对抗久坐带来的健康风险。研究表明，其益处因年龄而异。人类的身体进化是为了运动，而不是久坐的办公室生活。站立式办公桌是一种帮助人们站起来的流行方法，但其有效性仍在研究中。
best_quote_en: The human body evolved to forage and hunt on the African savannahs, not to sit in a cubicle all day.
best_quote_zh: 人类的身体进化是为了在非洲稀树草原上觅食和狩猎，而不是整天坐在办公室里。

title: High priests: why scientists gave magic mushrooms to the clergy
summary_en: Scientists conducted an experiment to explore how religious individuals respond to psychedelic drugs, specifically magic mushrooms. Participants experienced diverse perceptions of the divine, with some envisioning God as a dog, others as a harp-playing woman, and still others as the abstract concept of love.
summary_zh: 科学家进行了一项实验，旨在探索宗教人士对迷幻药物（特别是神奇蘑菇）的反应。参与者对神产生了不同的看法，有些人将上帝设想为一只狗，另一些人设想为一位弹竖琴的女人，还有一些人将其设想为爱的抽象概念。
best_quote_en: For Jeff Vidt, God actually was a dog: the Lord came to him as a Great Dane.
best_quote_zh: 对于杰夫·维特来说，上帝实际上是一只狗：上帝以大丹犬的形象来到他身边。

title: Show HN: A "Catalog of Catalogs" for Unified Metadata
desc:
Most developers talk about unifying data. But in reality, data lives everywhere — in lakes, warehouses, databases, streaming systems, AI/ML pipelines. Trying to centralize or replace them is costly, slow, and often fails.

So instead of asking “How do we unify the data?” we asked: “Can we unify the metadata?”

That’s the idea behind Apache Gravitino — an open-source “catalog of catalogs” that sits above your existing systems and provides:

Unified metadata governance without replacing your stack

Federated access to diverse systems (SQL, NoSQL, lakehouses, ML/AI)

A lightweight, extensible platform you can contribute to and extend

Website: Datastrato

Code: Apache Gravitino on GitHub

We’d love feedback from HN: Does focusing on metadata instead of data solve a pain you’ve seen? What gaps do you think still exist in the “data & AI catalog” space?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45002209

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Apache Gravitino is a high-performance, geo-distributed, and federated metadata lake that manages metadata across diverse sources, types, and regions. It offers unified metadata management, end-to-end data governance, direct metadata integration, geo-distribution support, multi-engine compatibility, and AI asset management.
summary_zh: Apache Gravitino是一个高性能、地域分布式和联邦元数据湖，用于管理不同来源、类型和区域的元数据。它提供统一的元数据管理、端到端的数据治理、直接元数据集成、地域分布支持、多引擎兼容性和AI资产管理。
best_quote_en: Manage diverse metadata sources through a single model and API (e.g., Hive, MySQL, HDFS, S3).
best_quote_zh: 通过单一模型和API管理多种元数据源（例如，Hive、MySQL、HDFS、S3）。
